```py
>>> import numpy.ma as ma
>>> a = ma.array([[1, 2] ,[3, 4]])
>>> a[0, 1] = ma.masked
>>> a
masked_array(
 data=[[1, --],
 [3, 4]],
 mask=[[False,  True],
 [False, False]],
 fill_value=999999)
>>> np.resize(a, (3, 3))
masked_array(
 data=[[1, 2, 3],
 [4, 1, 2],
 [3, 4, 1]],
 mask=False,
 fill_value=999999)
>>> ma.resize(a, (3, 3))
masked_array(
 data=[[1, --, 3],
 [4, 1, --],
 [3, 4, 1]],
 mask=[[False,  True, False],
 [False, False,  True],
 [False, False, False]],
 fill_value=999999) 
```

```py
>>> a = np.array([[1, 2] ,[3, 4]])
>>> ma.resize(a, (3, 3))
masked_array(
 data=[[1, 2, 3],
 [4, 1, 2],
 [3, 4, 1]],
 mask=False,
 fill_value=999999) 
```
